commands.command: INSERT INTO dbo.[Group] ( ID , Name , ParentID , [Percent], CreateTime , LastModifyTime , LastModifyUser ) VALUES ( NEWID() , @Name, @ParentID , @Percent, GETDATE() , GETDATE() , NULL )
UPDATE TOP(1) dbo.[Group] SET Deleted=1 WHERE ID=@ID
UPDATE TOP(1) dbo.[Group] SET [Name]=@Name,[Percent]=@Percent WHERE ID=@ID
